topic.title: Want to dive into bitcoins
topic.body: Hi. Been hearing a lot about bitcoins. Never used it. I just want to test out how the currency is in day to day transactions. Whats the most secure way to use bitcoins? I heard that your wallet can get hacked? Also downloading the entire blockchain on my slow connection will take a long time. So whats the alternative?

topic.title: Can I have more than one zeroIDs?

2_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body:
> [truth](#comment_2_164W1rFVD9Bm7poGJWvjVUjvkbhhFC5nnt): If you use asterisks [*], you can add italics and bold to your text, like this:
> this is *italics*
> this is **bold**
> *this sentence is italics*
> **this sentence is bold**
> Results:this is italicsthis is boldthis sentence is italicsthis sentence is bold

nice!

1_1GkoHb4XqFDbLnxzrZxSzJK7dqnxmGyBRP.body: Wow!!! Didn't think I would get such a nice response. Thank you everyone. I bought a tiny amount using localbitcoins.com and then spent it on bitrefill to recharge my prepaid phone. Worked pretty well. I am using the official bitcoin app atm.

1_15B3N5kBvnaMAv6ufCmSLf4BzexsZw66tS.body:
> [up4](#comment_49_1BLPKyrF2D4ertte6JnAa6oWAMYzZGwKQz): seed this, fag dearest
> or iterate through the list of domains in ZeroName

WTF

2_1J7dTw3ZsXUsXzpBqVWVj5aXRUMsMC6Nfc.body:
> [smiba](#comment_2_1FuufvPjG7U2JYz8GKyJthajxLXGELqccQ): People keep saying telegram is not secure but I've yet to see anyone break their security. They even got a $100k (iirc) reward for the first one to break their encryption

They have set up the reward program in such a way that it is difficult to break. Nobody would attack them that way. There are other simpler attack vectors. 

Disclaimer: I just read this stuff online. If I remember where I will post a link.

1_1FWsCi4sgjq9PyF3fdirysiehYVn162NGW.body: Yes. It appears to be abandoned.

2_1GkoHb4XqFDbLnxzrZxSzJK7dqnxmGyBRP.body:
> [19](#comment_1_1HUrhTUZFB2KKsXLUv1vugPH358iB6zsiY): Yes, you can, by enabling the multiuser plugin.

So you meant it is not natively supported?

1_1NSgPrjXY57jJ1QygTWehbHB9RS8fVvRBK.body: Dunno. Feel free to create one and tell people about ZeroNet.
